title: KGP Speedcubers
text: A hobby group of Speedcubers in IIT Kharagpur. We look to organize workshops and competitions in the campus. Frustrated trying to solve the Rubik's cube over and over? We are here to teach you how to solve the Rubik's cube and introduce you to the world of speedcubing where people across the globe compete in 18 different types of puzzles.
